title: 2015 Robert F. Kennedy Human Rights Ripple of Hope Gala
desc: TUESDAY, DECEMBER 8, 2015 | NEW YORK HILTON For more information please contact Juvale Regala at    301-675-8171  or  regala@RFKHumanRights.org . This event is expected to reach capacity. Early registration is encouraged.? ? Header photo: Alabama: March 21, 1965. Selma to Montgomery March for voting rights: Marchers and flags across the horizon. Airplane? is reconnaissance plane of Alabama National Guard on lookout for threats to march. ? 1976 Matt Herron/Take Stock/The Image Works
